name: text_editing_example_0
instruction: Perform the specified edits on the original texts using the described functions.

input.original_text:
Welcome to our team.
Please report to the manager.
Have a great day.
input.description: Add a line 'Orientation is on Monday.' after 'Welcome to our team.'
input.modified_text:
Welcome to our team.
Orientation is on Monday.
Please report to the manager.
Have a great day.

output.original_content:
Welcome to our team.
Please report to the manager.
Have a great day.

name: text_editing_example_3
instruction: Perform the specified edits on the original texts using the described functions.

input.original_text:
Today is sunny.
The weather is great.
input.description: Insert 'Let's go for a walk.' before 'The weather is great.'
input.modified_text:
Today is sunny.
Let's go for a walk.
The weather is great.

output.original_content:
Today is sunny.
The weather is great.

name: text_editing_example_6
instruction: Perform the specified edits on the original texts using the described functions.

input.original_text:
First line
Second line
Add a line after this.
Last line
input.description: 1. Add 'Newly added line' after 'Add a line after this.' 2. Delete 'Second line'
input.modified_text:
First line
Add a line after this.
Newly added line
Last line

output.original_content:
First line
Second line
Add a line after this.
Newly added line
Last line

name: text_editing_example_7
instruction: Perform the specified edits on the original texts using the described functions.

input.original_text:
username = 'guest'
password = 'password123'
Please update your profile.
input.description: 1. Replace all lines containing 'password' with 'password = 'redacted'' 2. Insert 'Note: Ensure data is current.' before 'Please update your profile.'
input.modified_text:
username = 'guest'
password = 'redacted'
Note: Ensure data is current.
Please update your profile.

output.original_content:
username = 'guest'
password = 'password123'
Please update your profile.
